articles.title: The mystery of why the coronavirus kills some young people - CNN
articles.description: Covid-19 seems to most seriously affect older people, particularly those with pre-existing conditions such as heart disease, lung disease and diabetes. But it's becoming apparent there are many younger people who still get very sick and die.
articles.content:
